data.title: Outlet Malls in Virginia
data.meta_description: Find deals on all your favorite brands at Virginia's outlet malls like Potomac Mills and Williamsburg Premium Outlets.
data.text:
If you're an outlet or sale or clearance junkie, keep reading! This is your go-to list for discount shopping in Virginia ...

Potomac Mills in Woodbridge is located along I-95 at exit 156, 30 minutes south of Washington, D.C. Shop 30-70% off retail! Over 200 retailers, including upscale clothing outlets, make for a fun shopping experience! Take advantage of savings from Abercrombie and Fitch, Ann Taylor, Banana Republic, bebe, Brooks Brothers, Eddie Bauer, Esprit, H&M, The LEGO Store, Nautica, Nine West, Nordstrom, Saks Fifth Avenue, Polo Ralph Lauren and more!

Leesburg Corner Premium Outlets in Leesburg features 110 outlet stores in a quaint and charming outdoor village atmosphere. Ann Taylor, Banana Republic, Barneys New York, Burberry, Gap, Nike, Saks Fifth Avenue, Pottery Barn, and Williams Sonoma are just some of the great outlets located just 20 minutes west of Dulles Airport.

Williamsburg Premium Outlets is one of the largest outlet centers in Virginia and is located midway between Richmond and Virginia Beach off I-64 in Williamsburg. Discover over 120 designer and name brand outlet stores showcased in a beautiful boutique atmosphere that reflects the colonial heritage of Williamsburg. Ann Taylor, Burberry, Coach, Cole Haan, Hugo Boss, Kate Spade, Michael Kors, Nike, Polo Ralph Lauren, and North Face are just a few of the outlets available.

Williamsburg Pottery on Route 60 West in Lightfoot is now writing a new chapter in its 75-year history of offering intriguing merchandise at great values. Opened in spring 2012, the new Williamsburg Pottery is made up of 3 extraordinary Marketplaces: Gourmet Kitchen, Home Essentials, and Outdoor Living. The Marketplaces, and freestanding Au Bon Pain restaurant, encompass more than 160,000 square feet of space.

Norfolk Premium Outlets is the newest outlet shopping destination serving Hampton Roads. Offering an exciting selection of name brand stores where customers can enjoy savings of 25% to 65% every day, Norfolk Premium Outlets boasts brands including A|X Armani Exchange, Michael Kors, Nike Factory Store, Polo Ralph Lauren, COACH, Levi's, Vans and more.

Green Front Furniture in Farmville and Manassas sells quality furniture, accessories and Oriental rugs at discount prices to customers all along the East Coast. Consistently one of America's Top 100 Furniture Retailers, it occupies 650,000 sq. ft. of showroom space in 12 historical warehouses in Farmville as well as a satellite warehouse in Manassas. Many prices are 40-50% off manufacturer's suggested retail price.

Green Valley Book Fair in Mt. Crawford is an outlet bookstore featuring 500,000 new books discounted from 60-90%! All categories of books can be found here. Learn why US Airways Magazine named it "The Best Bookstore on the East Coast" and Cooperative Living Magazine voted them one of Virginia's "Delightful Dozen" attractions.

Plow & Hearth Outlet in Rochelle offers 30 to 70% on catalog overstocks, discontinued items and one-of-a-kind samples. Capture even more savings when you shop during May and September - the semi-annual tent sale months!
